name: Serpent's Fang
passive: Shield Reaver: Deal 50% bonus damage to shields. When you damage an enemy champion, reduce their shield power by 50% for 3 seconds.
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Armor, Ability Haste. Passive effect: Deal 50% bonus damage to shields. When you damage an enemy champion, reduce their shield power by 50% for 3 seconds.. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: The penetration helps maintain damage relevance as the game progresses
Great for assassins looking to eliminate priority targets
Excellent for frontline champions who need to absorb damage
Build this when facing heavy physical damage compositions
